name: Soul Fight
description:
escape from the dungeons of your enemies and use your abilites. Beat the final boss to win the game.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys for left,right and jump. Lshift + arrow keys to run. Space for soul attack.

YOU CAN ENABLE MOBILE MODE FROM PAUSE MENU

you can run attack and jump. Also collect hearts with your soul.

3 individual levels different difficulties. No level locks.

3 different enemy types. Cyborgs and ghosts can follow you. you can attack by running through them or perform soul attack.

Ghosts can shoot and can only be killed by soul attack.

Enjoy!
